title: Film-Noir, Crime | The House Across the Lake (1953)  Alex Nicol, Hillary Brooke | Full Movie

sources.title: Film-Noir, Crime | The House Across the Lake (1953)  Alex Nicol, Hillary Brooke | Full Movie
sources.description:
An American writer living in England gets entangled in a scheme by a beautiful blonde to murder her rich husband.

Original title: The House Across the Lake (1953) AKA: Heatwave
Director & Writer: Ken Hughes
Producer: Robert Lippert
Stars: Alex Nicol, Hillary Brooke, Sidney James
Genres: Classics, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir
